author: Gregor Stuart Hunter
title: Global Stock Markets Continue Advance

organizations.name: global stock markets continue advance asia-pacific

text:
Global stocks pare Mondayâ€™s gains Fed Chairman Powell testimony in focus Sky leaps after Comcast counteroffer U.S. stocks bounced along the flatline Tuesday after Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell signaled in prepared remarks that the central bank plans to stick to a gradual path of interest-rate increases.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average added 24 points, or 0.1%, to 25746 shortly after the opening bell, while the S&P 500 rose 0.1%. The Nasdaq Composite fell less than 0.1%.
